item.title: Job Hunting
item.description: In this section, I conclude jobs I applied including time,location, company name, and result. This shows my journey to find a job. Please enjoy! Date Job.Title CompanyName Location Intern.Full.Time Where Result 7.30.2020 Data Analyst Tripalink LA Full Time Handshake 7.30.2020 Data Analyst DesignMuseum Boston, Remote Intern Handshake 7.30.2020 Data Analyst MilkCrate LLC Philadelphia Intern Handshake 7.30.2020 Business Analyst Immunitas,Therapeutics Cambridge Remote Intern Handshake 7.
